rules_text:
As this land enters, you may pay 2 life. If you don’t, it enters tapped.
{T}: Add {B} or {G}.
notes:
This land enters tapped.
T: Add B or G.
4BG, Discard Recurrent Depths: Return two target cards from your graveyard to your hand.

If KUT: Profane Grove
In the Weft, you can be an angel, a garden, a peal of thunder. You can be anything you want — except alone. 

if common: Dreaming Depths
Most users take a single body at a time, but some wish to live as a community, or even an expansive space.
